value: Every time they move, their {color} cloak flutters and twists.
They are clutching a dark, {physical_descriptor} cloak tightly against their body.
Their hand rests on the {weapon} they are prominently carrying at their side.
They are cradling a wooden crate that shakes, rattles, and {animal_sounds} even when they are not moving.
They twirl the ends of a magnificient {hair_color} mustache.
The overwhelming smell of {scent} lingers about them in a cloud.
Their {armor} attracts attention as light reflects off its {shiny_material} surface.
tags: {"shiny_material":["gem-encrusted", "oiled metal", "golden", "rune-engraved"], "armor_name_req":["Chain shirt", "scale mail", "breastplate", "half plate", "ring mail", "chain mail", "splint armor", "plate armor", "shield"]}

value: Something about the way they move catches your eye, and after a moment, you realize that the length of their stride is longer than you'd expect for someone their size.
As you pass them, they jump slightly, as if they had just noticed you.
As they pass you, you hear them muttering something under their breath. You can't hear everything, but you catch the words, {words}.
tags: {"words":["\"debt\", \"moneylenders\", and \"break a leg this time\"", "\"damn nobles\", \"get away with something like this\", and \"someone outta\"", "\"treasure\", \"rich\", and \"it'll work this time\""]}

value: They might have been considered handsome, if it were not for their {adjective} {body_part}.
They might have been beautiful, except for their {adjective} {body_part}.
They were handsome, except for their {adjective} {body_part}.
Their beauty was somewhat spoiled by their {adjective} {body_part}.
The {adjective} aura they give off is diminished by the {diminuitive} {clothing} they are wearing.
They move with a stiff, rolling gait, and you see that their {left_or_right} leg ends in {material}.
Over their {left_or_right} eye is a {design} eyepatch.
On their shoulder they have a small {animal}, which {verbs} you as you approach.
tags: {"animal":["monkey", "cat", "lizard"], "verbs":["glances with boredom at", "looks with interest at", "ignores", "hisses at", "moves defensively away from"]}
